summary: Dawnbreaker could be higher res... and now it is! :D
descriptionHtml:
Redone Dawnbreaker texture.

Parts of the retexture by Drowned Soul (used with permission) - his version can be found here:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4250

I took his version, and added a redone redetailed version of the original texture in parts where I felt his didn\'t fit - keeping a modified version of his beautiful blade texture and select other bits.

Want the blade to be more powerful too? Check out my Beefier Dawnbreaker mod:
http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=4526
author: Yushatak
